title: The Pursuit of Happyness
description: A struggling salesman takes custody of his son as he's poised to begin a life-changing professional career.

title: 3 Idiots
description: Two friends embark on a quest to find their long-lost companion, learning valuable life lessons along the way.

title: Zindagi Na Milegi Dobara
description: Three friends take a road trip across Spain, confronting their fears and discovering themselves.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of a simple man with a low IQ who witnesses and influences several historical events.

title: Dil Chahta Hai
description: Three inseparable friends navigate love, friendship, and life's challenges together.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Taare Zameen Par
description: An eight-year-old boy with dyslexia finds hope through an art teacher who understands him.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince flees his kingdom, only to learn the true meaning of responsibility and bravery.

title: Queen
description: A young woman goes on her honeymoon alone and discovers her own identity and confidence.

title: Up
description: An elderly widower embarks on an adventure to South America with an unlikely companion.

title: Bhaag Milkha Bhaag
description: The inspiring true story of athlete Milkha Singh who overcame adversity to become a champion.

title: Dead Poets Society
description: An English teacher inspires his students to seize the day and make their lives extraordinary.

title: Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge
description: Two strangers fall in love during a European trip and fight to be together against all odds.

title: The Notebook
description: A poor yet passionate young man falls in love with a rich young woman in 1940s South Carolina.

title: Good Will Hunting
description: A troubled genius janitor discovers his potential with help from a therapist.

title: Rocky
description: A small-time boxer gets a rare chance to fight the heavyweight champion.

title: Wake Up Sid
description: A lazy Mumbai college student discovers life and responsibility when he moves in with a friend.

title: Inception
description: A thief who steals corporate secrets through dream-sharing technology is given a chance at redemption.

title: English Vinglish
description: A housewife enrolls in an English-speaking course to stop her family from mocking her.

title: Finding Nemo
description: A clownfish searches the ocean for his abducted son with the help of a forgetful fish.

title: Gully Boy
description: A young man from Mumbai's slums pursues his dream of becoming a rapper.

title: La La Land
description: An aspiring actress and a jazz musician fall in love while pursuing their dreams in Los Angeles.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his greatest challenge yet when the Joker emerges as a chaos-driven criminal mastermind.

title: Dangal
description: A former wrestler trains his daughters to become world-class wrestlers, defying societal norms.

title: The Secret Life of Walter Mitty
description: A daydreamer escapes his mundane life by embarking on a global adventure.

title: Swades
description: A NASA scientist returns to India and rediscovers his roots while trying to improve village life.

title: Soul
description: A musician's soul gets separated from his body and he must find his way back before it's too late.

title: Yeh Jawaani Hai Deewani
description: During a trekking trip, an introverted girl meets a carefree traveler and their lives intertwine.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Barfi
description: A deaf-mute man falls in love with an autistic girl, creating a beautiful and touching story.

title: The Grand Budapest Hotel
description: A legendary concierge and his protégé become friends amidst the theft of a priceless painting.

title: Chak De! India
description: A disgraced hockey player coaches the Indian women's hockey team to glory.

title: The Devil Wears Prada
description: A young woman lands a job as assistant to a powerful fashion magazine editor.

title: Andhadhun
description: A blind pianist becomes embroiled in a series of mysterious events involving murder.
